about_the_game:
Underground Dweller: You are the keeper of the underworld, living peacefully in your abode. But suddenly, terrible monsters rose from the abyss, seizing your treasures! It's time to take up arms and return what was stolen! Fight monsters: Destroy various underground creatures using a variety of weapons and tactics! Jump on platforms: Move along dangerous areas, avoiding falls and traps. Collect ore: To return what was stolen.

Underground Dweller is a dynamic 2D platformer with action elements

- Attractive pixel graphics: Enjoy a bright and stylish visual style.
- Diverse levels: Explore unique locations with various obstacles and enemies.
- Many enemies: Fight different types of monsters, each of which requires its own approach.

Are you ready to return the stolen goods and protect your home? Forward, keeper!

name: Underground Dweller

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6320 (21866) or equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 (4 GB) or equivalent
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
